resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>

  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1765085876</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Reading images: an introduction to visual literacy</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Lesebilder: eine Einleitung in einen 
Sichtbildungsgrad</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Images de lecture : une introduction à 
l'instruction visuelle</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Imagens da leitura: uma introdução ao 
literacy visual</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Immagini della lettura: un'introduzione a 
literacy visivo</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Εικόνες ανάγνωσης: μια εισαγωγή στην οπτική 
βασική εκπαίδευση</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Imágenes de la lectura: una introducción a
la instrucción visual</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Images are all around us, and the ability to interpret them meaningfully is a vital skill for students to learn.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Humanities</string>
          </keyword>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Bilder sind ganz um uns, und die Fähigkeit, sie 
zu deuten ist aussagefähig eine lebenswichtige Fähigkeit, damit 
Kursteilnehmer erlernen.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Les images sont tout autour de nous, et la 
capacité de les interpréter est clairement une compétence 
essentielle pour que les étudiants apprennent.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">As imagens são toda em torno de nós, e a 
abilidade de interpretá-las é significativa uma habilidade vital 
para que os estudantes aprendam.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Le immagini sono interamente intorno noi e la 
capacità di interpretarle è chiaramente un'abilità vitale affinchè
gli allievi impari.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Οι εικόνες είναι όλες γύρω από μας, και η δυνατότητα
να ερμηνεύσουν είναι με σημασία μια ζωτικής σημασίας ικανότητα 
για τους σπουδαστές για να μάθει.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Las imágenes están todo alrededor de nosotros, y
la capacidad de interpretarlas es significativo una habilidad vital 
para que los estudiantes aprendan.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Menschlichkeit</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Sciences humaines</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Humanities</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Studi umanistici</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ανθρωπότητες</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Humanidad</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>

END:VCARD</entity>
          </contribute>
        </lifeCycle>

          </identifier>
          <language>en</language>

        </metaMetadata>

        </educational>

            <value>yes</value>

        </rights>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
